awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: The rise and fall of the rock singer Jim Maclaine, in the mid 60s, with his manager, Mike, and his group, "The Stray Cats."

title: Stardust
